Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o46 pages. This is a completely rewritten version of the manuscript (quant-ph/9909080) with nearly the same title. The controversial part has been removed and replaced by an improved concept of states that has various
interpretations (e.g., Copenhagen, Bohm) as special cases. Part of the conclusions are different, too; everything is compatible with the orthodox view of quantum mechanics\u00a7r
